name: Iartol [Visual Novel] Chapter 2
description:
Welcome to the series of Iartol Visual Novels! CHAPTER 2 - "NEW ROCKETRY"

English Title: New Rocketry

Iqlxldie Title: Foifisai

Version: 1.0

Password for Entry: found in Chapter 1! Please play Chapter 1 to learn the password: https://dandin.itch.io/ivn001

Controls: Keypad - Enter password Mouse - Look around Mouse click - Continue X - Continue Return/Enter - Continue

Download for PC, Mac, or Linux!
